name: Crowd Control (itch) (JordanLiver)
description:
Objective: Keep the crowd alive

You may be the best there is, but the audience isn't here to see a blowout. They want a gripping fight between two rivals, biting and clawing their way for the advantage. They want an underdog story!

Controls
  • WASD and Arrow Keys to move your fists
Tips and Tricks
  • After every knockdown, an amount of "excitement" is added or subtracted from the audience
  • The longer you wait between knockdowns, the more excited the crowd will be when the next one comes
  • The bigger the gap between your scores, the more boring it is for the crowd
  • If a boxer gets knocked down 3 times in a single round, the match ends
Art Credits
  • 90% of the Art by overcrafted
  • Boxing Glove by Raga2D
  • Menu Boxing Ring  by waffen1
  • Silkscreen Font by Jason Kottke
  • Retro Gaming Font by Daymarius

Submission for Mini Jam 72 with the restriction that Death is a core mechanic
